body:
Well, as the tittle say, I am leaving Minecraft. But not only Minecraft, I am leaving all the videogames.
Why? Well, the main reason is school. I need to get perfect notes this year and the next for the university. But there are other reasons like friends, sports, etc, definetly don´t enough time for important things, because games for me now it isn´t the most important , because I lose time to do better things.
So only that.

Now It´s time for the people:

-Zaccc: Thanks so much for accpeting me on Fortissimus, when I was a little player on this comunity. Also you are a great person and I had great times with you. So thanks a lot for this time.

-MapDev: Well, what can I say that you don´t know. I love you su much Map, I will miss the time when we played together and the time we spent on Fortissimus. Don´t forget our jokes and our pvp battles. It was a great time with you.

-TheEpicPie: A ti te hablo en español. Hemos pasado un gran tiempo juntos, y espero que esto no se olvide, acuerdate de cuando en las scrims nos poniamos a hablar tu y yo español, y los demas no se enteraban de nada. Fuistes una de las primeras personas que conocí y estoy encantado de haberte conocido.

-Chicharry: Que te voy a decir. Pués que me he divertido contigo muchisimo, una pena que hayamos jugado juntos tan poco, pero que se le va ha hacer. Todavia me acuerdo de las risas que nos echabamos al ver a los hackers, y la cantidad de veces que acusabamos sin tener razón, solo por diversión.

-Nemo and Awesomerp: Thanks a lot for accepting me as one of your friends. Also thanks too for the skype group we had we 2 other people. There were great times with you guys. I will remember both forever.

Sorry if I forgot someone but I don´t remember any more person.

Also thanks for this comunity it was perfect, and I have to say one thing. This is better than OCN.

So then, after this boriing text, I wish the best for all of you.

I will not forget this perfect time with you guys.

I will not be available on Skype or Ts. Probably only on the forums.

title: Leaving Post
